title: TypeError: Load failed (network fetch failure)
description:
**Sentry Issues:** JAVASCRIPT-SVELTEKIT-A2, JAVASCRIPT-SVELTEKIT-9V
**URL:** https://post-playhouse.sentry.io/issues/JAVASCRIPT-SVELTEKIT-A2
**Occurrences:** Multiple

**Error:** TypeError: Load failed (postplayhouse.com)
**Affected pages:** /(app), /(app)/ticket-info
**File:** src/routes/(app)/+page.ts, src/routes/(app)/ticket-info/+page.ts

**Likely Cause:** Network fetch operations failing during page load. Could be due to:
- User network interruption
- API endpoint temporarily unavailable
- Request timeout

**Seer Analysis:** Not available (no budget)
close_reason: Network connectivity issue on user's end - not a code bug

title: DevalueError: Cannot stringify arbitrary non-POJOs
description:
**Sentry Issue:** JAVASCRIPT-SVELTEKIT-A1
**URL:** https://post-playhouse.sentry.io/issues/JAVASCRIPT-SVELTEKIT-A1
**Occurrences:** 1
**First Seen:** 2025-12-09

**Error:** DevalueError: Cannot stringify arbitrary non-POJOs
**Culprit:** GET /(app) - during prerender of getMediaImages

**Stacktrace:** Error in devalue stringify when trying to serialize data from /\_app/remote/prqesa/getMediaImages endpoint.

**Likely Cause:** The getMediaImages endpoint returns data that contains non-serializable objects (like class instances, functions, or complex objects). Data passed to SvelteKit must be plain JSON-serializable objects.

**Seer Analysis:** Not available (no budget)
close_reason: Fixed by refactoring media page to use enhanced:img (commits after Dec 9)

title: TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'sources')
description:
**Sentry Issue:** JAVASCRIPT-SVELTEKIT-A0
**URL:** https://post-playhouse.sentry.io/issues/JAVASCRIPT-SVELTEKIT-A0
**Occurrences:** Multiple
**First Seen:** 2025-12-09

**Error:** TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'sources')
**Culprit:** GET /(app)/media

**Likely Cause:** The media page loader is accessing .sources property on an undefined object. Check the data loading logic for the media page.

**Seer Analysis:** Not available (no budget)
close_reason: Fixed by refactoring media page - no longer accesses .sources directly (commits after Dec 9)

title: CustomEvent: unhandled promise rejection
description:
**Sentry Issue:** JAVASCRIPT-SVELTEKIT-7Q
**URL:** https://post-playhouse.sentry.io/issues/JAVASCRIPT-SVELTEKIT-7Q
**Occurrences:** Multiple
**First Seen:** 2024

**Error:** Event CustomEvent (type=unhandledrejection) captured as promise rejection
**Affected pages:** /(app)/productions/[year], /(app)/jobs

**Likely Cause:** An async operation is failing and the promise rejection is not being caught. Check for missing try/catch blocks or .catch() handlers on promises in the productions and jobs pages.

**Seer Analysis:** Not available (no budget)
close_reason: No stacktrace available - likely browser extension or third-party script. 15 occurrences over 11 months, not reproducible.

title: TypeError: Failed to fetch dynamically imported module
description:
**Sentry Issue:** JAVASCRIPT-SVELTEKIT-S
**URL:** https://post-playhouse.sentry.io/issues/JAVASCRIPT-SVELTEKIT-S
**Occurrences:** Multiple
**First Seen:** 2024 (ongoing)

**Error:** TypeError: Failed to fetch dynamically imported module (various node files)
**Affected pages:** /, /jobs, /ratings/, /productions/*, /calendar/*

**Likely Cause:** Dynamic module fetching fails when:
- Deployment changes chunk hashes but user has cached HTML
- Network issues during lazy loading
- Browser extensions blocking requests

**Seer Analysis:** Not available (no budget)
close_reason: Dynamic import cache issue - same as JAVASCRIPT-SVELTEKIT-T, happens when cached JS becomes stale after deployments

title: SyntaxError: Unexpected token - not found is not valid JSON
description:
**Sentry Issue:** JAVASCRIPT-SVELTEKIT-A4
**URL:** https://post-playhouse.sentry.io/issues/JAVASCRIPT-SVELTEKIT-A4
**Occurrences:** 1
**First Seen:** 2025-12-15

**Error:** SyntaxError: Unexpected token 'o', "not found" is not valid JSON
**Culprit:** GET /(app)/plan-your-visit
**File:** src/routes/(app)/plan-your-visit/+page.ts:5

**Stacktrace shows:** The load function calls res.json() on a response that contains the text "not found" instead of valid JSON.

**Likely Cause:** An API endpoint is returning a 404 or error response with plain text "not found" instead of JSON. The plan-your-visit page tries to parse this as JSON.

**Seer Analysis:** Not available (no budget)
close_reason: Fixed by commit 3a8b772c on Dec 15 - refactored to use static TypeScript data instead of API fetch

title: Try out beads
close_reason: Beads setup verified complete: daemon running, config set, JSONL tracked in git

title: TypeError: Importing a module script failed
description:
**Sentry Issue:** JAVASCRIPT-SVELTEKIT-T
**URL:** https://post-playhouse.sentry.io/issues/JAVASCRIPT-SVELTEKIT-T
**Occurrences:** 617
**First Seen:** 2024-03-17
**Last Seen:** 2025-12-19

**Error:** TypeError: Importing a module script failed
**Culprit:** /(app)
**Affected browsers:** Mobile Safari, various

**Likely Cause:** Module import failures typically occur when browser cache has stale references after deployment, network interruption during module loading, or dynamic imports failing due to version mismatches.

**Seer Analysis:** Not available (no budget)
close_reason: Browser caching issue, not a code bug - happens when cached JS modules become stale after deployments. Common with SPAs.

title: Error: Unable to preload CSS
description:
**Sentry Issues:** JAVASCRIPT-SVELTEKIT-8B, 9P, 9W, 9X, 9Y, A5
**URL:** https://post-playhouse.sentry.io/issues/JAVASCRIPT-SVELTEKIT-8B
**Occurrences:** 152+ across multiple issue variants
**First Seen:** 2025-05-23

**Error:** Error: Unable to preload CSS for https://postplayhouse.com/\_app/immutable/assets/1.B8231T6f.css
**Affected pages:** Various (/, /who/*, /calendar/*, /plan-your-visit/, etc.)
**Affected browsers:** Chrome, various

**Likely Cause:** CSS preload failures occur when:
- Deployment changes file hashes but user has cached HTML
- CDN/network issues preventing CSS delivery
- Browser extensions blocking resource loading
- CORS or mixed content issues

This is a common SvelteKit issue related to cache invalidation between deployments.

**Seer Analysis:** Not available (no budget)
close_reason: CSS cache invalidation between deployments - not a code bug, same root cause as module import failures

title: ReferenceError: site is not defined
description:
**Sentry Issue:** JAVASCRIPT-SVELTEKIT-A3
**URL:** https://post-playhouse.sentry.io/issues/JAVASCRIPT-SVELTEKIT-A3
**Occurrences:** 1+
**First Seen:** 2025-12-15

**Error:** ReferenceError: site is not defined
**Culprit:** GET /(app)/data/productions/[year].json

**Likely Cause:** A variable named 'site' is referenced but not defined in the productions data endpoint. Check the page.svelte.js or server files for missing imports or variable definitions.

**Seer Analysis:** Not available (no budget)
close_reason: One-time build error from Dec 15 - never recurred, code is correct

title: Error: 500 during SvelteKit prerender
description:
**Sentry Issue:** JAVASCRIPT-SVELTEKIT-9Z
**URL:** https://post-playhouse.sentry.io/issues/JAVASCRIPT-SVELTEKIT-9Z
**Occurrences:** 8
**First Seen:** 2025-12-09
**Last Seen:** 2025-12-15

**Error:** Error: 500 /plan-your-visit/ (linked from /plan-your-visit)
**Culprit:** SvelteKit prerender.js

**Stacktrace:** Error occurs in @sveltejs/kit prerender.js when saving prerendered pages - indicates a server-side error during static site generation.

**Related Issues:** Likely related to JAVASCRIPT-SVELTEKIT-A4 (JSON parse error) which occurs on the same /plan-your-visit page.

**Seer Analysis:** Not available (no budget)
close_reason: Fixed by commit 3a8b772c on Dec 15 - prerender now succeeds (was caused by JSON parse error in plan-your-visit)
